title: NBA Draft, MLB Trades, Mt Rushmore Of Things We Yell At Our TV Plus Runner Craig Engels
description:
A wild day in sports we start with MLB trades as Scherzer and Rizzo get traded. (2:55-12:40) NBA Draft and Russell Westbrook to the Lakers.(12:48-26:08) Olympics talk and Simone Biles made everyone lose their minds.(26:09-41:08) Mt Rushmore of things you yell at your TV while watching sports.(43:28-1:06:05) World class runner Craig Engels joins the show to talk about narrowly missing the Olympics, how much running sucks, and RV's. (1:02:51-1:29:44) We finish the show with Fyre Fest of the week.Â (1:31:01-1:51:39)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
